/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. Buildings and trees line the street, their details slightly blurred due to the distance from which the photo was taken. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
